item.description:
Join us for a day of fun at Six Flags New England and check out Fright Fest! We'll be riding roller coasters, checking out zombies and haunted rides, playing games to see who can win the biggest stuffed animal, and chowing on giant turkey legs, cotton candy and funnel cakes!

SIX FLAGS GENERAL INFORMATION:
http://www.sixflags.c...

PRICE:
One of the Wedelns has hooked us up with discount coupons so that we can get in for $25 per person (normally $42.99)! No pre-purchase required.

MEET US AT:
The park is open from 12 p.m. to 10 p.m. Meet us at Six Flags at 12 p.m.
NOTE: We will no longer be meeting at Riverside first. If anyone still needs a ride, please e-mail me ASAP!

RAIN DATE: Sunday, Oct. 24, 2010

FACEBOOK LINK- Feel free to share with your friends!
http://www.facebook.c...
item.how_to_find_us: Look for members who will be wearing their Wedeln Ski and Outdoors clothing gear
item.name: Six Flags New England - Fright Fest
